website_summaries.verdict: A superior formula that not only thickens hair, but makes it super clean and moisturized. Made by a brand that has been making products for thinning hair for more than 25 years.
pros: Boasts an innovative formula that unclogs follicles, possibly restoring their ability to grow hair
In addition to removing buildup, it also removes toxins, moisturizes, and conditions
cons: Somewhat pricey, especially considering the bottle is about one-third the size of some competing brands and it works best when used with the brand's other products

customer_reviews.title: Like this shampoo, but plan to try another product with natural DHT blocking ingredients.

Still, I didn't know better for years, and I like the minty smell and feel of my hair after using this shampoo, but, I am going to try a different product for shampooing, but still use the "Step 3" Scalp Treatment which I do believe stimulates the scalp, may thicken my hair, and is still made in the USA.
